alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:50PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baca and northeastern Las Animas Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 550 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles southwest of Higbee to 9 miles northwest of Pritchett. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Baca and northeastern Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
